home.AboutContent: As a second-year student at ENIGMA, I am seeking an internship in network administration to start my career in this field. My long-term goal is to specialize in network security, a field that particularly interests me. I first want to gain solid experience in managing network infrastructures and system configuration. Motivated and autonomous, I am ready to contribute my technical skills to a dynamic IT team.
home.DevelopmentContent: With experience in C, Java, Python, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I am versatile in software development, working on projects ranging from system programming to dynamic web applications.
home.ReseauContent: My training has provided me with a solid understanding of computer networks, as well as practical skills in configuration, management, and troubleshooting.
home.BDDContent: I have expertise in database management with SQL and NoSQL, including design, maintenance, and optimization to ensure performance and data integrity.
home.SportContent: I currently practice weightlifting and am passionate about rugby, which I played in my youth. These activities have helped me develop discipline, endurance, and teamwork.
